Title: Four not-having-to-bend scrolls (3, 4)
Designer: Nanhui District Spare Time Art Group (南汇县业余美术创作组)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: This poster together with the preceeding uses a depiction of the four seasons to illustrate how much agriculture has changed in the New China.(Second of two sheets; the first is BG E15/103).
